params.initialOwner: Address that will control this registry (typically a multisig).

getAllStrategiesByOwner(address).details: This is a view-only helper intended for off-chain indexing/UI.

params.strategyId: Id of the strategy (scoped to msg.sender).
Id of the strategy to query (scoped to `owner`).

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.adapter: CL adapter contract bound to the target pool/gauge.
params.description: Free-form description (e.g., JSON URI, IPFS hash).
params.dexRouter: DEX router to be used by ClientVaults for swaps.
params.name: Human-readable name.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.allowed: True to allow, false to disallow.
True to allow, false to disallow.

params.strategyId: Strategy id to update (scoped to msg.sender).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateStrategy(uint256,address,address,a.details: Does not change the active flag.

params.name: New name.
params.strategyId: Strategy id to be updated (scoped to msg.sender).

allowedAdapters(address).notice: Approved adapter contracts that users can reference.

allowedRouters(address).notice: Approved DEX routers that users can reference.

getAllStrategiesByOwner(address).notice: Returns all strategies registered by a given owner.

getMyStrategy(uint256).notice: Returns full metadata for msg.sender's strategy id.

getStrategy(address,uint256).notice: Returns full metadata for a given owner's strategy id.

getStrategyIdsByOwner(address).notice: Returns the list of strategyIds registered by a given owner.

isStrategyActive(address,uint256).notice: Checks if a strategy exists and is active for a given owner.

nextStrategyIdByOwner(address).notice: Next strategy id to be assigned per owner (starts at 1).

registerStrategy(address,address,address.notice: Register a new strategy for msg.sender.

setAdapterAllowed(address,bool).notice: Allow or disallow a given adapter contract.

setRouterAllowed(address,bool).notice: Allow or disallow a given router contract.

setStrategyActive(uint256,bool).notice: Activate or deactivate a msg.sender strategy.

strategiesLengthByOwner(address).notice: Returns the number of strategies registered by a given owner.

updateStrategy(uint256,address,address,a.notice: Update metadata of an existing msg.sender strategy.
